name: Gold Medal All Purpose Flour, Baking Flour, 3 lb Resealable Bag
short_description: PANTRY STAPLE: Our most versatile flour for any recipe that simply calls for flour; Brings out the best in your baked goods
BAKING ESSENTIAL: Strong enough for high rising yeast breads, mellow enough for pizza dough, cookies, cakes, and flaky pie crusts
RESEALABLE BAG: Comes in a convenient, resealable bag for easy storage
ENDLESS USES: Keep a bag of this premium quality flour on hand for your last minute baking needs; Get inspired by recipes on our website
CONTAINS: One 3 lb resealable bag of Gold Medal All Purpose Flour
product_description: Gold Medal All Purpose Flour is the perfect companion in the kitchen. This versatile flour is strong enough for high-rising bread and mellow enough for your favorite pie crust. It can be used anytime a recipe calls for flour. A blend of pure white hard and soft wheat means every baked bite looks and tastes its absolute best. It can be used in recipes from breads to pizza dough and cookies to cakes. Comes in a convenient, resealable bag and is presifted to help you get to the mixing bowl sooner. Whether you're whipping up a birthday cake, or want to fill the house with the scent of freshly baked bread, choose our flour as your go-to ingredient for flawless taste and texture. Gold Medal has over 135 years of baking success. We mill the flour that people rely on to make everything from family favorites to new and inspired creations. We put our best into everything we do - so you can too.

name: King Arthur 100% Organic All-Purpose Flour, Unbleached, 2 lb (Pack of 1) - Non-GMO Project Verified, No Preservatives
short_description: Our organic unbleached flour works in any recipe calling for "flour" or "all-purpose flour," delivering consistent results every time. Ideal for the full range of your baking repertoire, from brownies and cookies to pies, muffins and yeast bread

Milled from 100% organic hard red winter and spring wheats, this jack-of-all-trades flour is malted; unenriched (also never been bleached or bromated); and will strengthen breads, bake up lofty biscuits, and turn out delicately crumbed cakes
King Arthur 100% Organic All-Purpose Unbleached Flour is Non-GMO Project Verified and Approved Organic by USDA

name: Bob's Red Mill Gluten Free 1 to 1 Baking Flour, 22oz (Pack of 4) - Non GMO, Vegan, Kosher
short_description: GLUTEN FREE MADE EASY: Bob’s Red Mill expertly crafted a one-to-one blend of gluten free flours, starches and xanthan gum; effortlessly transforms traditional cookies, cakes, brownies, muffins and pancakes into gluten free treats
TESTED AND CONFIRMED GLUTEN FREE: Tested and confirmed gluten free in a 100% dedicated gluten free facility; safe for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity

NO SPECIALTY INGREDIENTS NEEDED: Making delicious gluten free baked goods is a snap with this Gluten Free 1-to-1 Baking Flour blend; simply follow your favorite baking recipes and replace wheat flour with this easy-to-use blend
GOOD INGREDIENTS FOR ALL: Bob’s Red Mill measures and blends superior gluten free flour blend which works wonderfully in recipes that call for baking powder or baking soda; not for yeast breads

INCREDIBLY VERSATILE: Ideal for gluten free baking, including cookies, cakes, brownies, muffins and more; thickens sauces and gravies; makes delicious gluten free pasta; use to bread proteins and so much more
product_description: Delicious moments to share start with good ingredients for all. Bob’s Red Mill measures and blends high-quality ingredients like gluten free flours, starches and xanthan gum to create this easy-to-use gluten free flour blend, a one-to-one replacement for wheat flour. Now it’s easy to transform traditional cookies, cakes, brownies, muffins and pancakes into gluten free treats—replace your flour, not your recipes!

name: Gold Medal All Purpose Flour with Resealable Bag, 4.25 pounds
short_description: ALL PURPOSE: This flour is strong enough to take high-rising yeast breads to new heights and mellow enough to make perfect flaky pie crust
DESSERTS: Gold Medal All Purpose Flour is great for making muffins, cookies, cakes and more
BREAD: Because it doesn’t add color, it’s especially ideal for baking white breads and cakes
PANTRY PERFECT: Stock your pantry with Gold Medal All Purpose Flour for all your last-minute baking needs
CONTAINS: 4.25 lb
product_description: Gold Medal's best-selling flour comes in a convenient resealable bag. All purpose means just that — it's Gold Medal's most versatile flour for any recipe that simply calls for "flour." This all-purpose flour is a strong enough bread flour to take high-rising yeast breads to new heights, and mellow enough to make your family's favorite flaky pie crust recipe, even without sifting. Gold Medal All Purpose Flour is made of the stuff you can trust. A blend of pure white wheat so every bite looks and tastes its absolute best. And because it doesn’t add color, this flour ideal for baking white breads and cakes. Keep this versatile flour handy as a pantry staple for when you're creating cupcakes, pastry puffs, banana or soda bread. Gold Medal has 135 years of baking success. We mill the flour that people rely on to make everything from family favorites to new and inspired creations. We put our best into everything we do — so you can too.

name: Great River Milling Lily White Organic All-Purpose Flour | Unbleached & Unbromated | Non-GMO, Kosher | Ideal for Bread, Cookies, Cakes, Pizza Dough & Everyday Baking | 25 Lb
short_description: Unbleached and unbromated all purpose flour: Lily White all-purpose flour features clean processing and a soft, consistent texture for daily baking needs, ideal for cookies, breads, pastries, and pizza dough made with pure, reliable ingredients.
Daily baking solution: Balanced protein levels make this flour perfect for breads, cookies, cakes, pancakes, and pizza dough, offering dependable performance across everyday baking.
USDA Organic and Non-GMO: Certified USDA Organic and Non-GMO, this flour meets top standards for purity and transparency, giving you peace of mind with every recipe you prepare.
Consistent performance: Provides dependable structure, lift, and crumb texture across a wide range of baking applications including breads, cookies, pancakes, and quick breads.
Supersized supply: The 25 lb bag is ideal for scratch kitchens, batch bakers, and busy households that cook and bake often and need a reliable, all-purpose flour always ready to go.
product_description: Great River Milling All Purpose Lily White Flour is a premium unbromated organic unbleached all-purpose flour crafted and sourced from non-GMO wheat for superior flavor and nutritional value. Perfect for all your baking needs and ideal for any recipe, from bread, cakes, and cookies to dinner rolls, soups, stews, and pizza. With 11.5% protein content, our flour delivers the essential balanced gluten and protein qualities necessary for perfect homemade cakes and bread. Despite its pristine white appearance, our flour is chemical-free, retaining its natural state for wholesome baking. Trust Great River Organic Milling to exceed your expectations with every batch, crafting quality flours since 1975.
